entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
